'''A Thousand Questions With Paimon''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 1.6]].

==How to Access Event==
Go to [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/ys/event/answer-question/index.html?activity_no=d2a9f2f0b4f242aa&utm_source=website HoYoLAB]. Alternatively, through in-game's Event Notice or Mail.

==Event Duration==
2021-06-25 13:00:00 – 2021-06-27 23:59:59 (server time)

==Event Details==
During the event, Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can participate in this event daily.<br>
Travelers must answer 10 questions in each round of the quiz. Correct answers earn you rewards, while incorrect answers do not. Complete tasks to receive more attempts.

==Event Rewards==
{{Item|Mora|25|x=5,000}} will be obtained for every correct answer<br>
Claim rewards for up to 10 questions each day

==Reward Delivery==
Via in-game mail (there may be some delay in the delivery of rewards)<br>
The mail will be valid for 7 days, so be sure to collect your rewards in time.

* Each day, Paimon's questions will refresh at 04:00, please pay attention to the time.
